newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Anheuser-Busch Cos Inc Q2 oper net.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Anheuser-Busch Cos Inc Q2 oper net.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Q2 1996 income from continuing operations excluding discontinued operations income of $33.8 million or $0.07/shr.

Q2 1997 revenues reflect net sales based on gross sales of $3.46 billion and excise taxes of $469.1 million. Q2 1996 net sales based on gross sales of $3.42 billion and excise taxes of $456.9 million.
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)

NOTE: Six-month 1996 earnings from continuing operations excluding discontinued operations income of $33.8 million or $0.07 a share. Six-month 1997 earnings include gain of $54.7 million or $0.06 a share from the previous sale of the St. Louis Cardinals baseball team, Busch Memorial Stadium and other downtown St. Louis properties.
Excluding Cardinals gain, six-month 1996 income from continuing operations was $596.0 million or $1.17 per fully diluted share.

Six-month 1997 revenues reflect net sales based on gross sales of $6.33 billion minus excise taxes of $870.0 million. Six-month 1996 net sales based on gross sales of $6.185 billion and excise taxes of $852.5 million.
